name: RUINER
notes: Requires the latest version of GOG's Linux installer.

execute.command: cd $GAMEDIR/game/Ruiner/Content/Paks && cat Ruiner-LinuxNoEditor.pak.split01 >> Ruiner-LinuxNoEditor.pak && rm Ruiner-LinuxNoEditor.pak.split01

files.goginstaller: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Linux installer

content:
files:
- goginstaller: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Linux installer
game:
  exe: start.sh
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE/GOG
    file: goginstaller
    format: zip
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    src: $CACHE/GOG/data/noarch/
- move:
    description: merging resource files
    dst: $GAMEDIR/game/Ruiner/Content/Paks/Ruiner-LinuxNoEditor.pak
    src: $GAMEDIR/game/Ruiner/Content/Paks/Ruiner-LinuxNoEditor.pak.split00
- execute:
    command: cd $GAMEDIR/game/Ruiner/Content/Paks && cat Ruiner-LinuxNoEditor.pak.split01
      >> Ruiner-LinuxNoEditor.pak && rm Ruiner-LinuxNoEditor.pak.split01
    description: merging resource files
